author: DryRun
body:
HF was missing from hcalcalib PedestalTask plots due to the rounding of nsamples down to a multiple of four (to sample the capids evenly) -- this doesn't work for 3 samples, which gets rounded down to zero. This fix has PedestalTask use all samples for HF if nsamples<4.

This is the same as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/20078 for 92X. Note that I based this off of 9_2_X + https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19569, as 19569 is still waiting to be merged into 9_2_X. This PR only introduces one commit on top of that, https://github.com/DryRun/cmssw/commit/eaffe7c6d11aeced84e7492d5b573bf853d3be10.
title: HCALDQM: Fix missing HF in hcalcalib (92X backport of 20078)
